title: Jonas
body:
Jonas: Hello Detective.
Jonas: I've finished my prelimanary examination of the body.
Jonas: What would you like to know?
[[What was the cause of death? |Jonas.CauseOfDeath]]
[[Nothing for now. |Jonas.Exit]]

title: Jonas.Exit
body: Jonas: Okay, well feel free to come back and ask any questions.

title: Jonas.CauseOfDeath
body:
Jonas: The exact cause of death is unclear at this stage.
Jonas: What I can say for sure, is that the victim was attacked by multiple assailants.
Jonas: There are multiple injuries to the face, possibly inflicted by bare hands.
Jonas: The victim has also been shot through the stomach.
Jonas: Though it's puzzling that the victim died from these.
[[Let's talk about these facial injuries|Jonas.FaceInjuries]]
[[What details to you have about the gunshot wound? |Jonas.Gunshot]]
[[What's puzzling? |Jonas.Mystery]]

title: Jonas.FaceInjuries
body:
Jonas: The face has been struck multiple times.
Jonas: Jonas: There's a couple of chipped teeth, and a lot of bruising around the right side of the face.
Jonas: This indicates a pretty powerful punch was delivered before the victim died.
Jonas: I'll be able to let you know more once I take x-rays of the skull.
[[Let's talk about the gunshot wound next|Jonas.Gunshot]]
[[What was strange about these wounds?|Jonas.Mystery]]
[[Thanks Jonas, I'll come back if there's anything else|Jonas.Exit]]

title: Jonas.Gunshot
body:
Jonas: The bullet entered through the abdomen and pierced the large intestine and pancreas before it exited near the nape of the back.
Jonas: From the damage and fragments left behind, the bullet was likely full metal jacket 5.56mm. Used by the military, but still can be bought easily on the street.
Jonas: It's strange though, this damage shouldn't have been as catastrophic as it was.
[[What about the facial wounds?|Jonas.FaceInjuries]]
[[Why are these wounds strange?|Jonas.Mystery]]
[[Have you run ballistics on the bullet yet?|Jonas.Ballistics]]
[[Thanks Jonas, I'll come back if there's anything else|Jonas.Exit]]

title: Jonas.Mystery
body:
Jonas: Well it's strange.
Jonas: The bullet wound was fatal, but not immediately.
Jonas: A wound like that would have taken a few days to die from.
Jonas: Likewise, the punch to the face was heavy, but definitely not lethal.
Jonas: Even together, the two wounds wouldn't have caused death as quickly as these wounds have.
Jonas: I'm still waiting on the blood toxicology to come back. Maybe that will tell me more.
[[Tell me more about the bullet wound.|Jonas.Gunshot]]
[[Give me details about the facial injuries|Jonas.FaceInjuries]]
[[Thanks Jonas, I'll come back if there's anything else|Jonas.Exit]]

title: Jonas.Ballistics
body:
Jonas: I sent the bullet off to the labs. If we get a match, I'll let you know.
Jonas: Based on the entry and exit wounds, the rifle was likely fired from 2 or 3 blocks away.
Jonas: The chief has got officers checking the area at the moment.
[[What about the facial wounds?|Jonas.FaceInjuries]]
[[Why are these wounds strange?|Jonas.Mystery]]
[[Thanks Jonas, I'll come back if there's anything else|Jonas.Exit]]
